description: Command injection vulnerability in Helpdesk versions 1.1.21 and earlier in QNAP QTS 4.2.6 build 20180531, QTS 4.3.3 build 20180528, QTS 4.3.4 build 20180528 and their earlier versions could allow remote attackers to run arbitrary commands in the compromised application.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Helpdesk versions 1.1.21 and earlier in QTS 4.2.6: build 20180531, QTS 4.3.3: build 20180528, QTS 4.3.4: build 20180528 and earlier versions
